titleStmt.title: The blessednesse of a sound spirit: vvith the misery of a vvounded spirit VVhere first a sound spirit is described and differenced, and lets discouered, helpes prescribed. By Robert Harris.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for I. Bartlet, and are to be sold at his shop in Cheap-side, at the signe of the gilded Cup,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part of Harris's "Six sermons never heretofore published".
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
